double *  cvtr_k,
int *  err 
)

Get the principle curvature vector for an edge at a point.

Get the principle curvature vector for an edge at a point. Magnitude of vector is the curvature, direction is direction of principal curvature.

Parameters:
[in] instance iGeom instance handle
[in] edge_handle Edge being queried
[in] x Position being queried
[in] y Position being queried
[in] z Position being queried
[out] cvtr_i Maximum curvature vector
[out] cvtr_j Maximum curvature vector
[out] cvtr_k Maximum curvature vector
[out] err Returned Error status (see iBase_ErrorType)

double **  cvtr_2,
int *  cvtr_2_allocated,
int *  cvtr_2_size,
int *  err 
)

Get the curvature(s) on an entity(ies) at given position(s).

Get the curvature(s) on an entity(ies) at given position(s). If either the number of entities or number of coordinate triples is unity, then all points or entities are queried for that entity or point, respectively, otherwise each point corresponds to each entity. storage_order should be a value in the iBase_StorageOrder enum; if input as iBase_UNKNOWN, order is in native order with respect to implementation.

Parameters:
[in] instance iGeom instance handle
[in] entity_handles Entity(ies) being queried
[in] entity_handles_size Number of entities being queried
[in] storage_order Storage order of coordinates
[in] coords Starting coordinates
[in] coords_size Number of values in coordinates array
[in,out] cvtr_1 First principal curvatures
[in,out] cvtr_1_allocated Allocated size of first curvature array
[in,out] cvtr_1_size Occupied size of first curvature array
[in,out] cvtr_2 Second principal curvatures
[in,out] cvtr_2_allocated Allocated size of second curvature array
[in,out] cvtr_2_size Occupied size of second curvature array
[out] err Returned Error status (see iBase_ErrorType)

double *  cvtr2_k,
int *  err

Get the two principle curvature vectors for a face at a point.

Get the two principle curvature vectors for a face at a point. Magnitudes of vectors are curvature, directions are directions of principal curvatures.

Parameters:
[in] instance iGeom instance handle
[in] face_handle Face being queried
[in] x Position being queried
[in] y Position being queried
[in] z Position being queried
[out] cvtr1_i Maximum curvature vector
[out] cvtr1_j Maximum curvature vector
[out] cvtr1_k Maximum curvature vector
[out] cvtr2_i Minimum curvature vector
[out] cvtr2_j Minimum curvature vector
[out] cvtr2_k Minimum curvature vector
[out] err Returned Error status (see iBase_ErrorType)
